name: Afterlife: Rickard's Quest
description:
Afterlife: Rickard's Quest is a challenging retro platformer spread across hundreds of levels, in which dashing hero Rickard Bronson must battle in the air and on foot to save the world from the invading denizens of the Thirteen Realms of Hell.

The game features hundreds of levels, from tricky mazes and puzzles to deadly combat arenas, the ability to record and share replays, and unlockable secrets including a level editor.

Originally released in October of 2004, Afterlife: Rickard's Quest has been improved and developed over the intervening years thanks to lots of great feedback from players, and also has two sequels: Afterlife 2: Rickard's Journey, and Afterlife 3: Legends of Rickard Bronson.

For those curious, a full detailed changelog of the game's updates is available here, and forums can be found here to discuss the game, share custom levels and replays or seek help, hints and tips.
